Package com.gsm.model

Class SaleOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.model.AuditableEntity
      • com.gsm.model.SaleOrder
  • @Entity
public class SaleOrder
extends AuditableEntity
    Represents the core Sale Order entity, acting as the header for a customer's order. It maps to the "SaleOrder" table and holds all general information for an order.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.lang.String currencyCode
      The currency code for this order (e.g., "VND", "USD").
      private Customer customer
      The customer who placed the order.
      private java.lang.String customerPO
      The customer's own Purchase Order number for their reference.
      private java.util.List<SaleOrderDetail> details
      A list of all detail lines associated with this sale order.
      private java.time.LocalDate orderDate
      The date the order was placed.
      private java.time.LocalDate productionEndDate
      The planned end date for production of this order.
      private java.time.LocalDate productionStartDate
      The planned start date for production of this order.
      private java.lang.Long saleOrderId
      The unique identifier for the Sale Order.
      private java.lang.String saleOrderNo
      The unique, business-logic-driven number for the sale order (e.g., CUST-00001).
      private java.time.LocalDate shipDate
      The planned date for shipping the order to the customer.
      private SaleOrderStatus status
      The current status of the order (e.g., New, InProgress, Shipped).

      • saleOrderId

        private java.lang.Long saleOrderId
        The unique identifier for the Sale Order.

      • saleOrderNo

        private java.lang.String saleOrderNo
        The unique, business-logic-driven number for the sale order (e.g., CUST-00001).

      • customer

        private Customer customer
        The customer who placed the order. Loaded lazily for performance.

      • orderDate

        private java.time.LocalDate orderDate
        The date the order was placed.

      • shipDate

        private java.time.LocalDate shipDate
        The planned date for shipping the order to the customer.

      • customerPO

        private java.lang.String customerPO
        The customer's own Purchase Order number for their reference.

      • currencyCode

        private java.lang.String currencyCode
        The currency code for this order (e.g., "VND", "USD").

      • productionStartDate

        private java.time.LocalDate productionStartDate
        The planned start date for production of this order.

      • productionEndDate

        private java.time.LocalDate productionEndDate
        The planned end date for production of this order.

      • status

        private SaleOrderStatus status
        The current status of the order (e.g., New, InProgress, Shipped).

      • details

        private java.util.List<SaleOrderDetail> details
        A list of all detail lines associated with this sale order. `orphanRemoval=true` ensures that if a detail is removed from this list, it is also deleted from the database.
